snippet: The decision of a federal judge in California leaves cannabis in the same class of substances as LSD, heroin and other drugs considered addictive and without accepted medical use.
abstract: Federal Judge Kimberly J Mueller declines order to remove marijuana from Drug Enforcement Administration's list of most harmful and addictive drugs, angering advocates of marijuana legalization.
lead_paragraph: The decision of a federal judge in California leaves cannabis in the same class of substances as LSD, heroin and other drugs considered addictive and without accepted medical use.

headline.main: No Clarity on Conflicting Laws as Judge Keeps Marijuana on List of Harmful Drugs
headline.print_headline: No Clarity on Conflicting Laws as Judge Keeps Marijuana on List of Harmful Drugs
